title: Liberation: A Post-apocalyptic Novel
description: He was tired of fighting nature, fighting its cruel inhabitants. All he had to do now was survive. It all comes down to survival, doesn’t it?When seventeen-year-old Runner was sentenced to death for stealing a loaf of bread in MegaCityOne, his dreams were literally at an end. But then, he opted to sign up for the Remnants of Men, a government-sanctioned search for a rumored freshwater lake beyond a radiated wasteland.At first, it seemed like a second chance to a new life—the transformation from zero to hero. But when he almost got killed by a rabid gang of men desperate for the single energy bar he wanted to eat, he soon came to understand that he was one of the many discarded into the wasteland to study the cannibalistic effects of a new drug called the Sixth Sense.Together with his best friend, Troy, and other groups of people, they all must find ways to survive not only the deadly wasteland but also the garden of traitors.
author: Peter Okafor
